Trade/Device Name(s): BD PhoenixTM Automated Microbiology System Cefoxitin 0.5-64 μg/mL EY
BD PhoenixTM Automated Microbiology System for use with the antimicrobial agent Cefoxitin 0.5-64 µg/mL on Gram-negative ID/AST or AST only Phoenix panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System Cefoxitin panels for rapid identification and antimicrobial susceptibility testing of bacterial isolates.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by MIC of Gram-negative and Gram-positive aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria isolates from pure culture, including Enterobacteriaceae, Non-Enterobacteriaceae, and Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, and Streptococcus genera, using Phoenix panels containing cefoxitin 0.5-64 μg/mL.
